Actions.Name: Get timezones of area
Actions.Description: Request a list of valid timezones for an area.

Actions.Name: Get current time based on IP
Actions.Description: Request the current time based on an IP. This is a "best guess" obtained from open-source data.

Actions.Name: Get timezone of location
Actions.Description: Request details of timezone for a location.

Actions.Name: Get timezone of region
Actions.Description: Request details of timezone for a region.

Actions.Name: Get all timezones
Actions.Description: Request a list of valid timezones.
